sentences.en: A thirteen year old girl is being treated after breathing in smoke.
sentences.cn: 一名13岁的小姑娘因吸入浓烟正在接受治疗。

sentences.en: Cairo has only thirteen square centimetres of green space for each inhabitant.
sentences.cn: 开罗居民的人均绿地面积仅13平方厘米。

sentences.en: Franklin and his thirteen-year-old son somehow got separated in the crush.
sentences.cn: 富兰克林和他13岁的儿子在人群中被挤散了。

sentences.en: In bridge, each player is dealt thirteen cards.
sentences.cn: 在桥牌游戏中, 每一位牌手拿到13张牌.

sentences.en: Lewis is the author of thirteen novels and ten non-fiction books.
sentences.cn: 刘易斯写了13本小说和10本纪实文学作品。

sentences.en: Many people think thirteen is an evil number.
sentences.cn: 很多人认为十三是个不吉利的数字.

sentences.en: There was evidence that thirteen people in all had taken part in planning the murder.
sentences.cn: 有证据表明共计13人参与策划了这起谋杀。

sentences.en: They’ve only sold thirteen tickets so far.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止他们仅仅售出13张票。

sentences.en: Thirteen is not divisible by any even number.
Thirteen months down, twenty-four years to go.
Thirteen people have been charged with treason — an offence which can carry the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 13人被控犯有叛国罪——一种可处死刑的罪行。

sentences.en: Thirteen per cent of Christie's coin and banknote auction went unsold.
sentences.cn: 佳士得13%的硬币和纸币拍卖流拍。

sentences.en: Thirteen per cent of the population live below the poverty line.
Thirteen unarmed civilians died in that attack.
sentences.cn: 13名手无寸铁的平民在那场袭击中丧生。

sentences.en: When it happened, I was thirteen (= 13 years old ) .

words.tran_cn: 第十三的；十三分之一的
